Brief History of Forex Education Hub

Tiazzan-Capital was founded in 2020 with a vision to democratize financial literacy and empower individuals with the skills and knowledge needed to navigate the complex world of forex trading. Recognizing a gap in accessible and comprehensive forex education, the company set out to provide high-quality resources and training to both novice and experienced traders. Despite the challenges posed by the global pandemic in its early days, Our Vision led the team on a tour across seven states in Nigeria to educate them about the Forex Market in 2020, this move alone birthed hundreds of aspiring forex traders across different states. Over the years, Tiazan-Capital has grown significantly, forming partnerships with industry experts and continuously updating its curriculum to reflect the latest trends and techniques in forex trading. The company's holistic approach to education, which combines theoretical knowledge with practical trading experience, has helped thousands of individuals achieve their trading goals.

Contact us

Mission Statement

To empower individuals with the knowledge and skills necessary to navigate the foreign exchange market confidently, providing comprehensive education, practical tools, and ongoing support to foster informed and responsible trading

Vision Statement

To be the leading provider of forex and crypto education, transforming the way people approach trading by promoting ethical practices, innovative learning solutions, and a global community of well-informed traders

Our CORE VALUE

T.R.A.D.E

  • Trustworthy
    Building a reputation for honesty and reliability, ensuring that all educational content is accurate and transparent.
  • Responsive
    Actively engaging with students and clients, providing timely support and adapting to their needs and feedback.
  • Accountable
    Taking responsibility for the quality of the education provided, constantly reviewing and improving teaching methods and materials.
  • Dedicated
    Demonstrating commitment to student success, offering comprehensive resources and support to help them achieve their trading goals.
  • Empowering
    Equipping students with the knowledge and skills they need to trade confidently and independently in the forex market.
